segments.text: Yes . Of my mother standing in the kitchen and me doing my homework before school ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How sweet ... if you make me some more toast , I'll let you use my new retro toaster ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK ! I'll show you how my mom did it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , and it's bigger than ours was .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hey ! What's that smell ? Are you burning the toast ?
segments.speaker: S2
